title: South Africa : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of users in millions, containing a total of 7 data points.
In general Number of users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2022 and 2023.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 19.8 was reached at Year 2023
Minimum Number of users in millions about 15.4 was reached at Year 2017
